verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6213>there<s%>: and make there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, who <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto thee when thou <S%H1272>fleddest<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>.

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1004>household<s%>, and to all that were with <S%H5493>him<s%>, Put away the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> that are among <S%H8432>you<s%>, and <S%H2891>purify<s%> <S%H2498>yourselves<s%>, and change your <S%H8071>garments<s%>:

and let us <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>; and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, who <S%H6030>answered<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>distress<s%>, and was with me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H1980>went<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> all the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> which were in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and the <S%H5141>rings<s%> which were in their <S%H241>ears<s%>; and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2934>hid<s%> them under the <S%H424>oak<s%> which was by <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>: and a <S%H2847>terror<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was upon the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that were round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H7291>them<s%>, and they did not pursue <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz<s%>, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> (the same is <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>), he and all the people that were with <S%H5971>him<s%>.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H416>El-beth<s%>-el; because there <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H1540>revealed<s%> unto <S%H1272>him<s%>, when he fled from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>'s <S%H3243>nurse<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and she was <S%H6912>buried<s%> below <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> under the <S%H437>oak<s%>: and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H439>Allon-bacuth<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>again<s%>, when he came from <S%H6307>Paddan-aram<s%>, and blessed <S%H1288>him<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8034>him<s%>, Thy name is <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: thy <S%H8034>name<s%> shall not be <S%H7121>called<s%> any more <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, but <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H410>him<s%>, I am God <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>: be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>; a <S%H1471>nation<s%> and a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be of <S%H4428>thee<s%>, and kings shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out of thy <S%H2504>loins<s%>;

and the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, to thee I will give <S%H5414>it<s%>, and to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>thee<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from him in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he spake with <S%H1696>him<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> set <S%H5324>up<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he <S%H1696>spake<s%> with <S%H4678>him<s%>, a pillar of <S%H68>stone<s%>: and he <S%H5258>poured<s%> out a <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> <S%H3332>thereon<s%>, and poured oil <S%H8081>thereon<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> with <S%H1008>him<s%>, Beth-el.

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>; and there was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H3530>some<s%> <S%H776>distance<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath<s%>: and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H3205>travailed<s%>, and she had <S%H7185>hard<s%> <S%H3205>labor<s%>.

And it came to <S%H7185>pass<s%>, when she was in hard <S%H3205>labor<s%>, that the <S%H3205>midwife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3372>her<s%>, Fear <S%H1121>not<s%>; for now thou shalt have another son.

And it came to <S%H5315>pass<s%>, as her soul was <S%H3318>departing<s%> (for she <S%H4191>died<s%>), that she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1126>Ben-oni<s%>: but his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> him <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.
And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath<s%> (the same is <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>).

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> up a <S%H4678>pillar<s%> upon her <S%H6900>grave<s%>: the same is the <S%H4678>Pillar<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H6900>grave<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>, and <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H4029>Eder<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3478>pass<s%>, while Israel <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in that <S%H776>land<s%>, that <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubine<s%>: and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H1121>it<s%>. Now the sons of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve<s%>:

the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah<s%>: <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, and <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, and <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, and <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>;
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>: <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>;
and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>, <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>: <S%H1835>Dan<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>;

and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%>, <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>: <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H836>Asher<s%>: these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, that were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H6307>Paddan-aram<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>, to <S%H7153>Kiriath-arba<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>), where <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned<s%>.
And the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%>, and <S%H4191>died<s%>, and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%>: and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> buried <S%H6912>him<s%>.
